Package presentation

Class CtrlPresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.CtrlPresentation
  • public class CtrlPresentation
extends java.lang.Object
    Presentation Controller Class. It communicates with the mainFrame where the different views will be loaded, and with the Domain Controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CtrlPresentation()
      Default empty Presentation Controller constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.String askHint​(int idKakuro, java.lang.String[][] field)

    • Method Detail

      • initPresentation

        public void initPresentation()
        This method sets the mainFrame as visible.

      • iniUserMenu

        public void iniUserMenu()
        This method instantiates a new UserMenuView.

      • iniGame

        public void iniGame​(int idKakuro)
        This method instantiates a new StartedGameView for an specific idKakuro.
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - Indicates the identifier of the kakuro referenced.

      • iniRanking

        public void iniRanking​(java.lang.String[][] data)
        This method instantiates a new StartedGameView for an specific idKakuro.
        Parameters:
        data - This variable contains the info that the rankingView will load.

      • iniSelectGameList

        public void iniSelectGameList​(int[] gamesId)
        This method instantiates a new SelectGameView for all kakuros existed in the repository.
        Parameters:
        gamesId - This variable contains all the identifiers of kakuros of the global repository.

      • iniPlayGameView

        public void iniPlayGameView​(int idKakuro)
        This method initializes a game view in progress or starts a new game.
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - It identifies the kakuro of the games.

      • logInUser

        public void logInUser​(java.lang.String username)
        This method sends the information collected in the LogInView to be processed by the domain
        Parameters:
        username - This attribute indicates the username the new user logged in.

      • getActiveUser

        public java.lang.String getActiveUser()
        This method sends a request for the username of the Active User in the system.
        Returns:
        The string contains the username of the Active User.

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
        This method sends a request to the domain controller in order to delete the Active User.

      • deleteGame

        public void deleteGame​(int idKakuro,
                       int idGame)
        This method sends a request to domain that deletes a game of a Kakuro from the Active User.
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - It has the identifier of the kakuro to search games of.
        idGame - Indicate the exact game to delete.

      • generateKakuro

        public java.lang.String[][] generateKakuro​(int rows,
                                           int cols,
                                           java.lang.String difficulty,
                                           int numFilledCells)
        This method sends the information collected from the CreateKakuroView in order that the domain can generate a new Kakuro.
        Parameters:
        rows - Indicates the rows of the new Kakuro to create.
        cols - Indicates the cols of the new Kakuro to create.
        difficulty - Indicates the difficulty of the new Kakuro to create.
        numFilledCells - Indicates the number of filled cells that the new Kakuro to create will contain.
        Returns:
        It returns the kakuro representated in String [][] with some white cells filled indicated by fc.

      • proposeKakuro

        public int proposeKakuro​(int rows,
                         int cols,
                         java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method sends the information readed by file to the domain in order to check if the proposed kakuro it has a solution.
        Parameters:
        rows - Indicates the rows of the new Kakuro to create.
        cols - Indicates the cols of the new Kakuro to create.
        field - It contains the information of each individual cell from a Kakuro.
        Returns:
        It returns the id of the new Kakuro created or -1 if it could'nt be created.

      • validateKakuro

        public java.lang.String validateKakuro​(int numColumns,
                                       int numRows,
                                       java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method validates if a kakuro has a valid format either way it indicates the source problem through the return value.
        Parameters:
        numColumns - Indicates the columns of the new Kakuro to create.
        numRows - Indicates the rows of the new Kakuro to create.
        field - It contains the information of each individual cell from a Kakuro.
        Returns:
        It returns the String "OK" if it is a valid Kakuro, and if it isn't it indicates the error message.

      • getKakurosGlobals

        public int[] getKakurosGlobals()
        This method asks for all the kakuros in the system.
        Returns:
        It returns a list with the information of all the existing kakuros.

      • getGames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getGames​(int idKakuro)
        This method asks for all the games of the Active User for a specific Kakuro.
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - It has the identifier of the kakuro to search games of.
        Returns:
        It returns a list with the information of all the games for a specific Kakuro.

      • listGlobalRanking

        public java.lang.String[][] listGlobalRanking()
        This method asks for the information of all the completed Games in the system with their score.
        Returns:
        An ordered list depending on the score of a completed Game from all the Games in the system.

      • listPersonalStats

        public java.lang.String[][] listPersonalStats()
        This method asks for the information of all the completed Games from the Active User.
        Returns:
        An ordered list depending on the score of a completed Game from all the games of the Active User.

      • askHint

        public java.lang.String askHint​(int idKakuro,
                                java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method asks to the Domain Controller for a hint in the game scenario with its current state.
        Parameters:
        field - Current state of the game scenario.
        Returns:
        It will contain in a formatted String the information of "posX:posY:value" if there are no more hints available it will return an error message.

      • validateSolution

        public boolean validateSolution​(int idKakuro,
                                int time,
                                int hints,
                                java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method will send the information of the current state of the game scenario being played in order to check if the solution is correct.
        Parameters:
        field - It will contain the current state of the game scenario.
        Returns:
        If the field is correct the boolean will be true either way will be false.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame​(int time,
                     int hints,
                     java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method will send a signal to the domain controller in order to update the state of the current game scenario for the current one.
        Parameters:
        field - It will contain the current state of the game scenario.

      • exitGame

        public void exitGame()
        This method will send a signal to the domain controller in order to decline the new changes to the state of the game scenario played.

      • makeUserMenuViewVisible

        public void makeUserMenuViewVisible()
        This method will make the UserMenuView visible.

        public void makeLogInViewVisible()
        This method will make the LogInView visible.

      • makeCreateKakuroViewVisible

        public void makeCreateKakuroViewVisible()
        This method will make the CreateKakuroView visible

      • makePlayGameViewVisible

        public void makePlayGameViewVisible​(java.lang.String game)
        This method will make the PlayGameView visible.
        Parameters:
        game - It indicates which game has to be loaded.

      • makeRankingViewVisible

        public void makeRankingViewVisible​(boolean globalRank)
        This method will make the RankingView visible.
        Parameters:
        globalRank - Indicates whether it has to show the globalRanking or the PersonalStats view.

      • makeSelectGameViewVisible

        public void makeSelectGameViewVisible()
        This method will make the SelectGameView visible.

      • makeStartedGameViewVisible

        public void makeStartedGameViewVisible()
        This method will make the StartedGameView visible.

      • createNewGame

        public java.lang.String createNewGame​(int idKakuro)
        This method creates a new Game for a specific idKakuro
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - Indicates the id of the kakuro to play
        Returns:
        It returns the id of the new created game if exists -1 if not.

      • resumeGame

        public java.lang.String resumeGame​(int idKakuro,
                                   int idGame)
        This method will send the information to the domain controller about the game that will be played.
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - Indicates the gameScenario of the Game.
        idGame - Identifies the Game that will be resumed.
        Returns:
        It returns the stats of the game and the current state of the field in a formatted string. All different attributes are divided by ":".
